biography_text: VARGAS, Juan, a Representative from California; born in National City, San Diego County, Calif., March 7, 1961; B.A., University of San Diego, San Diego, Calif., 1983; M.A., Fordham University, Bronx, N.Y., 1987; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 1991; lawyer; business executive; member of the San Diego, Calif., city council, 1993-2000; member of the California state assembly, 2000-2006; member of the California state senate, 2010-2012; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Third Congress in 1993, the One Hundred Fifth Congress in 1996, and the One Hundred Tenth Congress in 2006; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
